statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_id FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE blockchain_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name FROM products WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT product_name, product_id FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC, product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE blockchain_id = 'd7035272-4e26-4bee-82ff-2fb6b9d957aa' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, blockchain_id FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%apple%' AND blockchain_id IS NOT NULL;

SELECT product_id, product_name, blockchain_id FROM products WHERE product_name IN ('Apple', 'Banana', 'Orange') AND product_id BETWEEN '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001' AND '99999999-9999-9999-9999-999999999999';
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_identifier FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain WHERE product_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%chair%';
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY random() LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, product_name, product_identifier FROM products WHERE product_id='12345678-1234-4321-8765-123456789876'
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE '%shoes%'
SELECT products.product_name, blockchain.blockchain_hash FROM products INNER JOIN blockchain ON products.product_id=blockchain.product_id
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, blockchain_id FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM product_unique_ids ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT product_name, unique_id FROM products JOIN product_unique_ids ON products.product_id = product_unique_ids.product_id;

SELECT product_name, transaction_timestamp FROM products JOIN product_unique_ids ON products.blockchain_id = product_unique_ids.unique_id JOIN blockchain_records ON product_unique_ids.unique_id = blockchain_records.unique_id WHERE product_id = 2 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, blockchain_id FROM products WHERE product_id = 2;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_unique_ids WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_records WHERE transaction_timestamp < NOW();
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, blockchain_record FROM Product;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM Manufacturer;
SELECT * FROM Blockchain WHERE blockchain_name = 'Ethereum';
SELECT product_id, is_authentic FROM ProductAuthenticity WHERE blockchain_id = 'c19d7a75-03ce-4b97-b6da-46e1a2850cb4';
SELECT * FROM ProductAuthenticity WHERE is_authentic = true;
SELECT product_id, blockchain_id FROM ProductAuthenticity ORDER BY authenticity_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND unique_identifier IS NOT NULL;
SELECT manufacturer_name, manufacturer_address FROM Manufacturer WHERE manufacturer_address LIKE '%Street';
SELECT p.product_id, p.product_name, b.blockchain_name FROM Product p INNER JOIN Blockchain b ON p.blockchain_record ->> 'blockchain_id' = b.blockchain_id;
SELECT * FROM product_authenticity;
SELECT product_id, authenticity_status FROM product_authenticity WHERE blockchain_id='abc123';
SELECT product_id, blockchain_id FROM product_authenticity ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_ip FROM blockchain_nodes WHERE node_name LIKE '%node%';
SELECT * FROM product_authenticity ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, blockchain_id FROM product_authenticity WHERE authenticity_status = True;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_details FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM user_credentials WHERE username LIKE 'admin%';
SELECT history_id, product_id, timestamp, action_taken FROM product_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
